sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './BonusBridgeExplanation.css'; /** * Component that provides concise explanation of the Bonus Bridge scoring system * Mobile-optimized version with narrower, more readable content * @param {Object} props - Component props * @param {Function} props.onClose - Function to close the explanation */ const BonusBridgeExplanation = ({ onClose }) => { // State to track which tab is active const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('core'); // Function to handle tab changes const handleTabChange = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab); }; return (

Bonus Bridge Scoring Explained

{/* Tab navigation */}
{/* Core Principles Tab */} {activeTab === 'core' && (

Core Principles

  • Balance gameplay between declarers and defenders
  • Reward good defense even when contracts are made
  • Scale scores to more manageable numbers
  • Consider HCP distribution between the teams
  • Reward skill rather than just card distribution

Game Contract Definitions

  • 3NT
  • 4♥/♠
  • 5♣/♦
  • Any slam (6-7)

Expected HCP by Contract

Part Scores (1-2) 21 HCP
3NT Game 25 HCP
4♥/♠ Game 24 HCP
5♣/♦ Game 27 HCP
Small Slam (6) 30 HCP
Grand Slam (7) 32 HCP
)} {/* Made Contracts Tab */} {activeTab === 'made' && (

Made Contract Scoring

  1. Raw Score ÷ 20: Makes numbers more manageable
  2. HCP Adjustment: Compares your HCP to expected for contract type
  3. Performance: Rewards overtricks
  4. Contract Bonus: Game +2, Slam +4/+6, NT +1
  5. Distribution: -1 to -3 for highly distributional hands
  6. Defender Reward: Points for good defense

Contract Categories:

  • Made Part Score: Contracts below game level
  • Made Game: Game contracts with strong/weak/balanced hands
  • Made Slam: Higher bonuses for slam contracts
)} {/* Defeated Contracts Tab */} {activeTab === 'defeated' && (

Defeated Contract Scoring

  1. Base Penalty: Raw score ÷ 10
  2. Level Penalties: Game +3, Small Slam +5, Grand Slam +7
  3. Performance Bonus: For defeating by 2+ tricks
  4. Declarer Consolation: For weak hands attempting ambitious contracts

Defeat Categories:

  • Failed Part Score: Lower penalties
  • Failed Game: Higher penalties
  • Failed Slam: Highest penalties

Minimum defender score for defeated contracts: 3 points

)}
); }; export default BonusBridgeExplanation;
